attributes.action: To allow fans back in to football grounds
attributes.additional_details: I want to help the nations mental health for a start but to help clubs an peoples livelihoods an to be look forward to enjoy life again an to help the encmomy but to show we are winning against this virus an we can be trusted to do the right thing an be trusted to help others
attributes.background: Too allow trials to be reopened to allow small amounts of fans back in too open air football grounds

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552036
